sentences: Akadeemiline aasta 'kõrgkooli kahest semestrist koosnev õppeaaja'
context: The word 'kahest' appears to be part of the compound Estonian word 'akadeemiline kahest', which refers to an academic year consisting of two semesters in a higher education context. In this usage, 'kahest' means 'of two' or 'consisting of two'.
